statements: INSERT INTO Flap SELECT a.flap as id, 'closed' as status FROM pattern [every a=Room(temperature > cast(25,double)) -> ( (Room(id=a.id, temperature > cast(25,double)) and not Room(id=a.id, temperature <= cast(25,double))) -> (Room(id=a.id, temperature > cast(25,double)) and not Room(id=a.id, temperature <= cast(25,double)))) where timer:within(10 seconds)]
